title: UK Firms’ Profits Hit by Policy Changes and Geopolitics, EY Says
description: Large UK businesses are seeing their profits eroded by policy changes and rising geopolitical instability, according to research carried out by consultancy firm EY.
content: Large UK businesses are seeing their profits eroded by policy changes and rising geopolitical instability, according to research carried out by consultancy firm EY.
